result.title: Evaluation of crystalline outcrop analogue
result.description: High resolution mapping by means of drone assisted and ground photogrammetry on exceptional large scale crystalline basement exposures will be performedThese mappings will be used as input for numerical geometrical 3D reconstruction of fracture networksSamples taken in the field will be used for petrophysical testing and microfabric investigations in the laboratoryAll obtained data will be implemented in numerical models in order to investigate the geothermal potential of the considered reservoir

result.title: Spatio-temporal nowcasting of local severe weather events with deep neural networks

details.authors: In the last decades, the intensity and frequency of extreme weather events have increased in Europe. The climate change, through its impact on the atmospheric processes, is expected to lead to further increase of such severe phenomena which also affect the air traffic activities. Therefore, a continuous monitoring and understanding of convective and pre- convective environment is highly demanded a
